channel.title: Environment in the 70s
channel.description:
A cross-section of environmental problems facing the next decade. A presentation of the New York State College of Agriculture at Cornell University. Hosted by Professor of Wildlife Science Doug Gilbert.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Land Use Planning
item.description: A cross-section of environmental problems facing the next decade. A presentation of the New York State College of Agriculture at Cornell University. Hosted by Professor of Wildlife Science Doug Gilbert. This program features Lawrence Hamilton, Professor of Forestry and Conservation at Cornell, being questioned by a group of graduate students from the department.
item.dc:creator: Gilbert, Douglas L.
item.dc:subject: Universities and colleges
